postReview.title: Southampton 0-3 Aston Villa: Emery's super subs seal late victory
postReview.description: Aston Villa left it late, but thanks to three substitutes, they earned a 3-0 win over Southampton in the Premier League to move up to fifth.

preReview.title: Rusk convinced with Southampton's professionalism ahead of Villa visit
preReview.description: Southampton host Aston Villa in the Premier League this weekend, under a week since their relegation back to the Championship was confirmed.

QAData.question: Who won between Southampton and Aston Villa on Sat, 12 Apr 2025 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Aston Villa won 3–0 over Southampton on Sat, 12 Apr 2025 14:00:00 GMT.
